Room.Name: Caledonia Road
Room.ShortDescription: Caledonia Road continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: The village of Brownhaven has often been noted for the famous people who have come here to retire. Great mages, fighters and clerics live on the southwest side of the little town, giving parties for one another and discussing the old days. Not much time is devoted to local politics, but there is a thriving political machine here. That is, when the mayor isn't drunk.
